alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 6:07PM EDT until April 02 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Madison, Jefferson and Taylor Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 53.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 53.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon by 1200 PM EDT.
